name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $sequence
desc: Returns: Indicates the order in which the dosage instructions should be applied or interpreted.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the order in which the dosage instructions should be applied or interpreted.

name: $text
desc: Returns: Free text dosage instructions e.g. SIG.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Free text dosage instructions e.g. SIG.

name: $additionalInstruction
desc: Returns: Supplemental instructions to the patient on how to take the medication  (e.g. "with meals" or"take half to one hour before food") or warnings for the patient about the medication (e.g. "may cause drowsiness" or "avoid exposure of skin to direct sunlight or sunlamps").

name: $addadditionalInstruction
desc: Supplemental instructions to the patient on how to take the medication  (e.g. "with meals" or"take half to one hour before food") or warnings for the patient about the medication (e.g. "may cause drowsiness" or "avoid exposure of skin to direct sunlight or sunlamps").

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Supplemental instructions to the patient on how to take the medication  (e.g. "with meals" or"take half to one hour before food") or warnings for the patient about the medication (e.g. "may cause drowsiness" or "avoid exposure of skin to direct sunlight o

name: $patientInstruction
desc: Returns: Instructions in terms that are understood by the patient or consumer.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Instructions in terms that are understood by the patient or consumer.

name: $timing
desc: Returns: When medication should be administered.

name: $site
desc: Returns: Body site to administer to.

name: $route
desc: Returns: How drug should enter body.

name: $doseAndRate
desc: Returns: The amount of medication administered.

name: $doseAndRate.type
desc: Returns: The kind of dose or rate specified, for example, ordered or calculated.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The kind of dose or rate specified, for example, ordered or calculated.

name: $maxDosePerPeriod
desc: Returns: Upper limit on medication per unit of time.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Upper limit on medication per unit of time.

name: $maxDosePerAdministration
desc: Returns: Upper limit on medication per administration.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Upper limit on medication per administration.

name: $maxDosePerLifetime
desc: Returns: Upper limit on medication per lifetime of the patient.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Upper limit on medication per lifetime of the patient.
